All this "Belly" slander today is tiring. 1) one of greatest soundtracks of all time 2) top opening scene maybe of any urban movie if not all movies to me 3) realistic plot (for the most part) 4) relateable characters
Can't believe I am justifying this movie to folks.
@CoachAntBrown Like I said. I’m not gonna debate. But will add that from the opening scene in the Tunnel it was a wrap. Realistic (for the most part) and def moves hip hop culture at the time.
@CoachAntBrown https://t.co/h8wBN44hQz
Great movie. Period. Not up for debate. https://t.co/M9xP6JIgcf

@CoachSJMiles @CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 Bruh, Calvin Murphy in their too. I just looked at a list of the HOFer's and im trying to figure out why you trying to keep out dudes that got much better stats than dudes that are in the hall. Stephon Marbury got better numbers than Calvin Murphy.
@CoachSJMiles @CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 😂😂😂😂
@CoachAntBrown 👀👀👀
@CoachSJMiles @CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 Gus Johnson is the the HOF. C'mon man. D. Howard is a career 20 & 12 guy. Bosh should not get in but Drexler is in.
@CoachSJMiles @CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 What is a hype year?
@CoachSJMiles @CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 Hold up. Tracy McGrady had 7 or 8 elite years in the NBA. Thats HOF worthy,
@CoachSJMiles @CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 Agreed. Winning one without Lebron helps his case. Jackson only won with Jordan or Kobe. Not his fault but a fact.

@CoachSherm5 @CoachSJMiles @vettepassby35 But if they was saying that than that makes my point. Lebron is one of the all time greats. And of course if you do not have a elite coach (u just said Phil wasnt) than ppl will say that player is the coach and the player will overshadow him.
@CoachSJMiles @CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 So Spo is in the same Elite category as Pop and Jackson to you?

@CoachSherm5 @CoachSJMiles @vettepassby35 How did I become a Lebron fan? You can't compare Blatt to Phil. Phil had the respect of the league. Had won a title as a player and a CBA coach. Was active within the US and well respected. I'm a Lebron fan now.... lol.

@CoachSJMiles @CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 Yall r changing the convo.... Jordan and Kobe won titles with elite coaches. Bron won them with decent coaches. That is my only point.
ps. I think Lue can be an elite coach.
@CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 Bruh. Im old as dirt. When he was hired there was a huge buzz. He was known as a really good coach that was eccentric. They won like 10 more games than the year before.

@CoachSherm5 @vettepassby35 Nah, Phil was destined for greatness. Took him a sec to get in the league due to his "hippie" persona but he won over 50 games his first yr. had success at every level prior to NBA job.

@vettepassby35 Right, and not a one of them has been a elite coach. If Bron played for Jackson, Pops or Kerr you would not be saying he puts coaches on hot seat. Spoelstra, Brown, Blatt, Walton, Lue will not go down in anyone's top coaches list.
@vettepassby35 Kobe and MJ both had elite coaches the majority of their careers. Not really fair to blame Bron for a 2nd yr coach getting put on hot seat.

Things like these are not accidents or coincidences. Happens to often. Ruined an otherwise great breakfast. But next time U wonder why some POC have “chips” on their shoulder. Understand this is the norm.

Wifey is telling me to chill at this point and not say anything. 15 seconds later a couple walks in and they seat them at another booth. The server who overheard has a look on his face, walks over and ask us if we want a booth.

At a so called upscale breakfast and hostess is about to seat us. I ask for a booth an she says none are available. I point to the ones clearly open an she says they r for 3 or 4 ppl. I then notice a couple in one booth.
